title: Weird Pixel email from Google when I don't have a Pixel
content:
Hi, does anyone know why I received an email from Google about my Pixel when I don't have a Pixel phone? The email reads: "Welcome to your new Pixel, Phone by Google  Now that you're set up, discover ways your new phone can help make every day easier..." etc. 

My phone is a Samsung so definitely not a Pixel - I've never seen or been anywhere near a Pixel. Why would Google send me this weird email?
